duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional projects to uncover optimization opportunities and guide strategic decisions.
Conduct analysis/extraction, providing insights, turnaround plans, and monitoring of operational performance.
Build relationships with internal operational teams to understand their needs for actionable insight into the business.
Ensure consistency and integrity of reported data.
Develop, implement, and assess operational markers to identify areas of concern and trends.
Track progress of initiatives and improvements, and identify gaps or course corrections.
Improve performance by developing presentations of analytic findings.
Assist in coordinating cost savings and initiative impacts into the budgeting process.
Lead the creation, articulation, and interpretation of reporting insights to drive business outcomes.
Manage day-to-day operation of warehouse, including planning, organizing, and monitoring activities of support teams.
Analyze and implement corrective actions when inventory results are outside the normal range on key metrics.
Develop executive level presentations to provide compelling insights.
Work cross functionally with business groups to identify value proposition and impact of business objectives.
Develop, monitor, and improve data, tools, and reports required for Senior Leadership, including forecasting, planning, budgeting, and performance management processes.
Provide ongoing operational support as needed.
Lead profit improvement initiatives.
Coordinate the development, implementation, and continuous assessment of operational markers.
Manage the day-to-day operational and tactical aspects of warehouse operation.
Provide ongoing operational support as needed.
Assist in budgeting, forecasting, and ad-hoc requests.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Logistics, Supply Chain, Operations Management, or Analytics preferred
Lean Six Sigma training and certification
